connect20/refund_retriever.name: connect20/Refund_Retriever

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/refund_retriever.description: Refund Retriever helps you save on FedEx and UPS shipping. This extension allows you to sign up for the Refund Retriever service with one click, giving you easy access to the customer Account Center.
